Hello everyone, I want to connect my HS form to my HubDb. Every time someone submits the form a new row should be added to the db(image, location ...). Is there an internal HS function to set this up or should I solve this through the api?
Thank you for your answers :}

Hi Fabian, we dont have anything via a function or the like that allows this. Depending on your CMS tier, you may be able to make use of serverless functions to accomplish this. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions>
Otherwise, you are correct in using the API to make this happen.

Hey Fabian, I just implemented this myself on a project and Iâ€™ll also warn you that images in particular can be tricky, as you need to send the file to the File Manager API first prior to referencing it in the DB call.
Thank you for the tip with the serverless functions <@U2H3TT8F2>. I will try it out.

Hey <@U26BLKGE4>, a tricky one, I see. So you solved it by sending the image to the file manager then adding it to the db with the url from the file manager?
Thank you for sharing your solution and the warning :)
